title: Apt for Sublease
laundry: ['application fee details: Fee included w/deposit', 'w/d in unit']
posting_body: ['Hello.', 'I’m trying to sublease my apartment located in the Westchase/Westheimer area.', 'My mom recently has been diagnosed with a terminal illness and I had to move to San Antonio to be her caretaker.', 'I have a 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment.', 'Washer & dryer in unit as well as gym & washing facilities on property.', 'It is within walking distance of local bus line as well as various eating places, as well as shopping strip including Target & Whole Foods.', 'I’m hoping to find someone in need of a place that could be a blessing to me as I blessing to you.', 'Serious inquiries only.', 'Contact for pictures.', 'Background check required.', 'Deposit required upfront.', 'Must make 2x rent.', 'Pets ok.', 'Perfect for a couple, student, etc.']
